newsArticles.title: TeamSite is live!
newsArticles.author: John Smith
newsArticles.text: The moment we've all been waiting for is here! After much anticipation and hard work, our new company TeamSite is active!!! If you have not already been trained in its use, please see your line manager for assistance.

modules.name: Safety Module
modules.description: This module will focus on teaching you about basic safety principles, and should be completed by all employees.

assess.question: Q1. What is the best way to lift a box?
assess.optionA: Bend down directly to it and put your back into it.
assess.optionB: Bend at your knees and keep your back straight.
assess.optionC: Find someone else to pick it up for you.
assess.optionD: Use a pallet jack to raise it to shoulder height.

assess.question: Q2. What should you do if you find a spill on the floor?
assess.optionA: Yell loudly until a cleaner comes to clean it. Its their job.
assess.optionB: Put a wet floor sign over it. Someone will get to it eventually.
assess.optionC: Clean it up straight away, so nobody slips.
assess.optionD: Leave it, your other tasks are more important.

assess.question: Q3. What should you do if your unsure how to do something safely?
assess.optionA: Ask your line manager or a coworker to help you.
assess.optionB: Just try your best; everybody is already busy.
assess.optionC: Go on your break and wait for someone else to do it.
assess.optionD: Quit the job, if you don't know the answer you shouldn't be working there.

modules.name: Skill Module
modules.description: This module will focus on teaching you about a skill, including relevant safety. All employees perform relevant roles should complete this.

assess.question: Q1. How do you prepare the fruit?
assess.optionA: Smash it on the floor and moosh it more with your foot.
assess.optionB: Grate it for an extra zesty flavour.
assess.optionC: Only peel it. Whole fruit retains more flavour.
assess.optionD: Chop it up into roughly even pieces.

assess.question: Q2. What device do we use to make the smoothies?
Q3. How do we serve the smoothie?
assess.optionD: Pour straight into the customers mouth.

modules.name: Compliance Module
modules.description: This module will focus on teaching you how to make sure our operations are compliant. This module should be completed by relevant managers.

assess.question: Q1. How do we ensure hot food is hot enough?
assess.optionA: Hold it to our skin - if it burns its ready to go.
assess.optionB: Use a thermometer to make sure it is above 60°C.
assess.optionC: Use a thermometer to make sure it is below 75°C.
assess.optionD: Leave an egg on it for 10 minutes. If it hard boils, its hot enough!

assess.question: Q2. What tempurature should refrigerated food be stored at?
assess.optionA: Room tempurature with the air conditioner on.

assess.question: Q3. Which of the following is a common allergen?
